title: Christmas with a Billionaire
description: Claire is determined to improve her and her children's lives, never expecting to be rescued from a snowstorm by a billionaire hottie . . .Claire attempts to beat the biggest snow storm in fifty years only for her car to end up in a ditch, engulfed in snow, and no one to help her and her two children.When Gavin hopped onto his snowmobile and drove into the snowstorm, he never expected to rescue a charming woman and her two lovable children.Christmas is around the corner, and they're stuck in his cabin. Now, they must learn how to live together and tamp down their attraction toward each other until she can find a way home.
author: Janae Griffin
